page.title: 15Leisure and Recreation
page.content: Leisure and recreation is very important in people's lives today. For the unemployed, it is a way of filling time and making up for the loss of 'job satisfaction.' For those in work, it provides oportunities to relax and to keep physically fit. Squash and tennis are extremely popular as there is a private tennis club in Bridgnorth and a squash league at the local Leisure Centre. Cricket is a sport appealing to many boys and men and the local club runs three teams in Saturday and Sunday Leagues. Bowling is particularly popular with older and retired people - both men and women and there are clubs in High Town and Low Town - the latter on the Bylet Island. Karate and Judo are not so popular as other sports but there are various clubs at the Leisure Centre.
